Methods in scene that return Intersection
 Intersection Scene.findIntersection(IRay ray, ISceneObject originatingObject)

 Intersection Scene.isIntersects(IRay ray)

Methods in scene with parameters of type Intersection
 double Scene.getSL(IRay ray, ILight light, Intersection hitPoint)
          Returns 0 if the given ray from a hit point to a light source intersects with other objects (blocked), or 1 otherwise (not blocked).
